content.rendered:
BABY BLUE FOR SPRING + FAVORITE PRODUCTS

For Spring and Summer I’m daydreaming of beautiful colors to add to my closet like this baby blue look by Maisie Wilen from FWRD.com Don’t be afraid to wear all one color with matching top and pants while keeping your accessories minimal.

Also, adding some of my favorite beauty products from D’Lashes like my top selling D’Wispy lashes and the perfect lash wash to keep you lash extensions and lashes clean.

Another amazing product is the DR. Barbara STURM serum. Developed in collaboration with Golden Globe-winning actress Angela Bassett, Dr. Barbara Sturm Darker Skin Tones Hyaluronic Serum is packed full of highly concentrated long and short chain hyaluronic molecules to provide intensive hydration and work as a super booster against fine lines and wrinkles. Complexion refining Lumicol lends a smoother, brighter appearance and creates a more even skin tone. Finished with Dr. Sturm’s signature anti-aging and anti-inflammatory ingredient, Purslane, this soothing serum delivers visibly firmer, refreshed, and radiant skin. It’s a must try!

Look is from FWRD.COM. Earrings are from Balenciaga. Luxury candles are by yours truly D’Lashes.com. Shoes and bag are from Bottega Veneta.

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love and health!
